name: Around Langbiang mountain
description: Where will you go when you come Dalat..? Follow me, i will show you the famous destinations. I will talk you about the life and the habit of the inhabitants.Today, we will visit Langbiang mountain→ Lach Village → Golden Stream → Cu Lan Village.If you stand on the top of Langbilang you can see all the sight of Dalat city and of course we can see Golden Stream, Lach Village and Cu Lan Village.. haha
